name: hold
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: hold
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to take and keep something in your hand or arms

example.eg: Can you hold the bag while I open the door?
example.egtrans: 我开门时你能帮我拿一下包吗？

example.eg: He was holding a gun.
example.egtrans: 他当时正拿着一把枪。

example.eg: The little girl held her mother's hand.
example.egtrans: 这个小女孩抓着妈妈的手。

example.eg: He held her in his arms.
example.egtrans: 他把她抱在怀里。

example.eg: Could you hold the door open, please?
example.egtrans: 你能扶住门让它一直开着吗？

example.eg: Rosie held out an apple for the horse.
example.egtrans: 罗西拿着一个苹果伸向那匹马。

example.eg: All those who agree, please hold up your hand (= raise your arm).
example.egtrans: 同意的请举手。

example.eg: Will the rope be strong enough to hold my weight?
example.egtrans: 这根绳子禁得住我的重量吗？

example.eg: Each wheel is held on with four bolts.
example.egtrans: 每个轮胎都由4颗螺栓固定。

example.eg: The parts are held together with glue.
example.egtrans: 这些部件是用胶粘在一起的。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to press your nose tightly between thumb and finger in order to close it

example.eg: I have to hold my nose when I jump into water.
example.egtrans: 当我跳到水里时必须捏住鼻子。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: When two people hold hands, one person holds the other person's hand, especially to show that they love each other.
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: （尤指为了表示两人相爱）手拉着手

example.eg: They walked along holding hands.
example.egtrans: 他们手拉着手向前走。

dsense.name: hold
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to contain or be able to contain something

example.eg: This jug holds exactly one pint.
example.egtrans: 这只壶的容量刚好是1品脱。

example.eg: One bag won't hold all of the shopping - we'd better take two.
example.egtrans: 买的这些东西一个袋子装不下——我们最好拿两个。

example.eg: Computers can hold huge amounts of information.
example.egtrans: 计算机能存储海量的信息。

trans_examp.trans_en: If you say that the future holds something, you mean that that thing will happen

example.eg: Who can tell what the future holds?
example.egtrans: 谁又能知道将来会发生什么事呢？

example.eg: She's very religious, so death holds no fear for her.
example.egtrans: 她笃信宗教，所以死亡对她来说一点也不可怕。

dsense.name: hold
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to have something, especially a position or money, or to control something

example.eg: He currently holds the position of technical manager.
example.egtrans: 他目前担任技术经理的职务。

example.eg: The bank holds large reserves of gold.
example.egtrans: 这家银行拥有大量的黄金储备。

example.eg: Despite incurring heavy losses, the rebels now hold the town and the surrounding hills.
example.egtrans: 叛军尽管损失惨重，但现在控制了该镇及其周围的小山。

dsense.name: hold
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to have a particular position in a competition
trans_examp.trans_cn: 在竞赛中保持（某个）位置

example.eg: She holds the world record.
example.egtrans: 她保持着世界纪录

example.eg: They held the lead until the 89th minute.
example.egtrans: 他们一直到第89分钟还保持领先。

dsense.name: hold
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to keep something, especially when it might have been lost

example.eg: I asked the shop to hold the dress for me until this afternoon.
example.egtrans: 我让那家商店帮我把那条长裙留到今天下午。

example.eg: You have to be a fairly good speaker to hold an audience's attention/interest.
example.egtrans: 要想保持观众的注意力／兴趣，你得是一个相当出色的演讲者才行。

trans_examp.trans_en: to keep someone in a place so that they cannot leave

example.eg: The police are holding several people in custody (= at the police station) for questioning.
example.egtrans: 警方拘留了几个人进行讯问。

example.eg: The terrorists held him hostage for 18 months.
example.egtrans: 恐怖分子将他扣为人质达18个月之久。

example.eg: I was held prisoner in a tiny attic room.
example.egtrans: 我被囚禁在一间小阁楼里。

dsense.name: hold
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to have something such as a meeting or an election
trans_examp.trans_cn: 使发生；举行（尤指会议或选举）

example.eg: Could we hold a meeting to discuss this tomorrow afternoon?
example.egtrans: 明天下午我们开会讨论这件事好吗？

example.eg: The election will be held on 8 August.
example.egtrans: 选举将于8月8日举行。

example.eg: I find it's almost impossible to hold a sensible conversation with her.
example.egtrans: 我发现几乎不可能和她进行理智的谈话。

dsense.name: hold
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to cause to stay or continue in the same way as before

example.eg: Let's hope our good luck holds.
example.egtrans: 希望我们好运不断。

example.eg: I hope the repair holds until we get the car to a garage.
example.egtrans: 我希望这样修一下能让我们把车子开到修车厂。

example.eg: The old adage that money talks still holds true (= is still true).
example.egtrans: 那句古老的谚语“有钱能使鬼推磨”现在依然所言非虚。

example.eg: The government is committed to holding exports at their present level.
example.egtrans: 政府承诺继续保持现有的出口水平。

example.eg: The ship/aircraft held its course.
example.egtrans: 这艘船／这架飞机保持了航向。

dsense.name: hold
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to believe an idea or opinion

example.eg: You sold it to me, so if it breaks I'll hold you responsible (= consider you to blame).
example.egtrans: 是你把它卖给了我，所以如果坏了你得负责。

example.eg: a legal decision that we hold to be unconstitutional
example.egtrans: 一个我们确信违宪的法律裁决

dsense.name: hold
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to wait, or to stop something temporarily

example.eg: They've decided to hold all future deliveries until the invoice has been paid.
example.egtrans: 他们决定，在对方付清发货清单上的货款之前，暂停所有未来的交货。

example.eg: How long can you hold your breath (= stop breathing)?
example.egtrans: 你憋气能憋多久？

example.eg: Will you hold my calls for the next half hour please?
example.egtrans: 半小时内请不要把电话转进来，好吗？

example.eg: She's on the phone at the moment - will you hold (the line) (= wait on the phone until she can speak to you)?
example.egtrans: 她在打电话——你能等一会儿吗？

dsense.name: hold
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: If you ask someone to hold something, you do not want them to include it.

example.eg: I'd like a ham sandwich on rye, hold the lettuce.
example.egtrans: 我要一个黑麦面包的三明治，不要加生菜。

name: hold
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: hold
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the act of holding something or someone, or the way you do this

example.eg: Keep a tight hold on your tickets.
example.egtrans: 拿好你们的票。

example.eg: Don't worry if you lose hold of the reins - the horse won't wander off.
example.egtrans: 如果缰绳脱手也不用担心——这匹马是不会乱跑的。

trans_examp.trans_en: in fighting sports, a position in which one person holds another person so that they cannot move
a place to put the hands and feet, especially when climbing
trans_examp.trans_cn: （攀爬时的）支撑点，手攀（或脚踩）的地方

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to start holding something or someone

example.eg: He took hold of one end of the carpet and tugged.
example.egtrans: 他抓住地毯的一端用力拖。

example.eg: I just managed to grab hold of Lucy before she fell in the pool.
example.egtrans: 我刚好在露西要掉进水池时抓住了她。

dsense.name: hold
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: power or control over something or someone

example.eg: Their company has a strong hold on/over the computer market.
example.egtrans: 他们公司在计算机市场举足轻重。

dsense.name: hold
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: If you are on hold when using the phone, you are waiting to speak to someone.

example.eg: Mr Briggs is on hold.
example.egtrans: 布里格斯先生正在电话那头等着呢。

example.eg: He's on the phone at the moment- can I put you on hold?
example.egtrans: 他的电话占线——您不要挂断电话，等一会儿可以吗？

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: If an activity is on hold, it has been intentionally delayed.

example.eg: Everything's on hold again because of the bad weather.
example.egtrans: 因为天气恶劣，一切都再次推迟了。

example.eg: The movie has been put on hold until the financial situation improves.
example.egtrans: 那部电影被推迟拍摄，直到财务状况有所好转为止。

dsense.name: hold
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the space in a ship or aircraft in which goods are carried
